messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] stuffed animals into puppets

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/17/2004 5:21:56 PM Eastern Standard Time,
aceto3@... writes:
> With a needle and thread and scrap fabric and some fiddling, many/most
> stuffed animals can be turned into puppets, if your kids would like those more.
>
> -Cat
Awesome idea, thanks!!!! I'll have to try that.

Pamela

messages.subject: stuffed animals into puppets
messages.msgSnippet: With a needle and thread and scrap fabric and some fiddling, many/most stuffed animals can be turned into puppets, if your kids would like those more. -Cat
messages.messageBody:
With a needle and thread and scrap fabric and some fiddling, many/most stuffed animals can be turned into puppets, if your kids would like those more.

-Cat

Pamela writes:
We asked everyone once to not send any more stuffed animals
cuz they are expensive and my kids don't play with them ever. We have chains
from the ceilings filled with the cutest dust collector's you've ever seen.
Once in awhile we throw them all down for cleaning and they fiddle with them for a minute, then they're off to do something else.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
